review: I'm very satisfied with this small stick wonder. Even though it's hidden at the back of my TV, there's no communication problem between the stick and the controller when I need to search for movies or videos from my library. Even my preschooler easily figured out how the control works in playing games. I would recommend it to my friends.
author: Curious George

review: We initially bought the fire TV and LOVED it- so I but one of these for all the other TVs in the house- so glad I did!  I feel I could cancel my cable bill if I wanted to.  I also love how on the amazon music portion it lists the words of the song so you can sing along :)
